requirements.summary: Remove all “Built with … caffeine.ai” branding text/link from the app layout footer while keeping footer spacing visually consistent.
acceptanceCriteria: The footer in `frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx` no longer renders the text 'Built with' or the 'caffeine.ai' link.
No hyperlink to `https://caffeine.ai/` is present in the rendered UI footer.
App layout spacing remains visually consistent after removing the footer branding (no awkward empty footer area).

file_operations.description: Remove the Caffeine AI branding text and any caffeine.ai hyperlink from the footer; replace with a neutral footer (e.g., copyright-only) or adjust footer layout so spacing remains consistent and no empty/awkward area is introduced.
